metadata.title: CVE-2018-14950 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The mail message display page in SquirrelMail through 1.4.22 has XSS via a"<svg><a xlink:href=" attack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14950` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

squirrelmail - 2:1.4.23~svn20120406-2+deb8u3ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: squirrelmail package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.4.23~svn20120406-2+deb8u3ubuntu0.16.04.1').
